code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';const GPTChatBot=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([{role:'system',content:'You are a friendly healthcare assistant helping seniors.'}]);const[input,setInput]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const sendMessage=async()=>{if(!input.trim())return;const newMessages=[...messages,{role:'user',content:input}];setMessages(newMessages);setInput('');setLoading(true);try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/chat',{messages});const reply=response.data.choices[0].message;setMessages([...newMessages,reply]);}catch(error){console.error(error);alert('There was a problem contacting the assistant.');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'1rem',borderRadius:'10px',marginTop:'2rem'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h3",null,"\uD83E\uDDD1\u200D\u2695\uFE0F CareCompanionAI Chatbot"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{height:'300px',overflowY:'auto',marginBottom:'1rem',backgroundColor:'#f9f9f9',padding:'1rem'}},messages.filter(m=>m.role!=='system').map((m,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{key:i,style:{marginBottom:'0.5rem'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("strong",null,m.role==='user'?'You':'Bot',":")," ",m.content))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),onKeyPress:e=>e.key==='Enter'&&sendMessage(),style:{width:'80%',padding:'0.5rem'},placeholder:"Ask me a question about Medicare..."}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:sendMessage,style:{marginLeft:'0.5rem',padding:'0.5rem 1rem'},disabled:loading},loading?'Thinking...':'Send'));};export default GPTChatBot;
